DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine Health Related Quality life ( HRQOL ) ( physical , mental , emotional social functioning ) patient cubital tunnel syndrome follow anterior intramuscular transposition , one year .
DOC.brief_title: Health-Related Quality Life Cases Cubital Tunnel Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: As many different surgical procedure address cubital tunnel syndrome , HRQOL use determine anterior intramuscular transposition provide patient positive outcome . To measure HRQOL 3 specific scale administer : 1 . A generic scale , Short Form-36 2 . A condition specific scale , Patient-Rated Ulnar Nerve Evaluation ( PRUNE ) 3 . A utility scale , EuroQOL , five dimension questionnaire These scale widely report literature , valid , reliable easy fill . Using scale determine HRQOL well Quality Adjusted Life Years , , allow u cost-utility analysis ( economic evaluation ) specific procedure . Patients ask fill mention questionnaire , well perform 2 performance test ( grip strength , move 2-point discrimination test ) follow time point : 1 . 1 week prior surgery 2 . 1 day prior surgery 3 . 3 month post surgery 4 . 6 month post surgery 5 . 12 month post surgery
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis cubital tunnel syndrome confirm Electromyography ( EMG ) test Ultrasound image Ability comprehend English complete health relate quality life questionnaire Willing provide inform consent Age > 18 year Not pregnant Prior ipsilateral cubital tunnel release Evidence symptomatic clinical double crush syndrome confirm EMG/Nerve Conduction Study ( NCS ) Patients rheumatoid arthritis , connective tissue disorder , tenosynovitis , diagnose neurological condition could confound assessment healthrelated quality life regard affect arm hand
